requirements_verified.description: Color scale tokens: Primary, Secondary, Accent, Neutral, Semantic, Agent status

test_names: should define primary color scale (--primary-50 through --primary-950)
should define secondary color scale (--secondary-50 through --secondary-950)
should define accent color scale (--accent-50 through --accent-900)
should define neutral color scale (--neutral-0 through --neutral-950)
should define semantic color tokens (success, error, warning, info)
should define agent status color tokens

requirements_verified.description: Typography tokens: font families, sizes, weights, line heights

test_names: should define --font-primary as Inter with fallbacks
should define --font-mono as JetBrains Mono with fallbacks
should define font size scale from xs through 5xl
should define font weight tokens (light through extrabold)
should define line height tokens
should have @import for Google Fonts

test_names: should define spacing scale based on 4px grid

should define container and sidebar dimension tokens

should define glow shadow variants

requirements_verified.description: Transition and motion tokens: durations and easing functions

test_names: should define transition duration tokens
should define easing function tokens

should define light theme border tokens

should set color-scheme to light

requirements_verified.description: Z-index scale: base to toast (0-700)

should set data-theme attribute on documentElement

test_names: should handle all three modes in the inline script
